Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Neeyum, Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Nee Azhaiththukkonduvandha Janangalum, Ivvidaththai Vittup Purappattu, Un Sandhadhikkuk Koduppen Endru Naan Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Aanaiyittukkoduththa Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththukkup Pongal.
2 naan Oru Thoodhanai Ungalukku Munbaaga Anuppi, Kaanaaniyanaiyum Emoriyanaiyum Eththiyanaiyum Perisiyanaiyum Eviyanaiyum Eboosiyanaiyum Thuraththividuven.
3 aanaalum, Vazhiyile Naan Ungalai Nirmoolampannaadhabadikku, Naan Ungal Naduve Sellamaatten, Neengal Vanangaak Kazhuththulla Janangal Endraar.
4 dhukkamaana Ivvaarththaigalai Janangal Kettapodhu, Oruvarum Thangal Aabaranangalaip Pottukkollaamal Thukkiththukkondirundhaargal.

5 enendraal, Neengal Vanangaak Kazhuththulla Janangal, Naan Oru Nimishaththil Ungal Naduvil Ezhumbi, Ungalai Nirmoolampannuven; Aagaiyaal, Neengal Pottirukkira Ungal Aabaranangalaik Kazhatrippodungal; Appozhudhu Naan Ungalukkuch Seyyavendiyadhai Ariven Endru Isravel Puththirarukkuch Sol Endru Karththar Moseyode Solliyirundhaar.
6 aagaiyaal, Isravel Puththirar Orep Malaiyaruke Thangal Aabaranangalaik Kazhatrippottaargal.

7 mose Koodaaraththaip Peyarththu, Adhaip Paalayaththukkup Purambe Dhooraththile Pottu, Adharku Aasarippuk Koodaaram Endru Perittaan. Karththaraith Thedum Yaavarum Paalayaththukkup Purambaana Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkup Povaargal.
8 mose Koodaaraththukkup Pogumbodhu, Janangal Ellaarum Ezhundhirundhu, Thangal Thangal Koodaaravaasalil Nindrukondu, Avan Koodaaraththukkul Piravesikkumattum, Avan Pinne Paarththukkondirundhaargal.
9 mose Koodaaraththukkul Piravesikkaiyil, Megasthambam Irangi, Koodaaravaasalil Nindradhu; Karththar Moseyode Pesinaar.
10 janangal Ellaarum Megasthambam Koodaaravaasalil Nirkakkandaargal; Janangal Ellaarum Ezhundhirundhu, Thangal Thangal Koodaaravaasalil Panindhu Kondaargal.

11 oruvan Than Sinegidhanode Pesuvadhupola, Karththar Moseyode Mugamugamaaip Pesinaar; Pinbu, Avan Paalayaththukkuth Thirumbinaan; Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Avanudaiya Panividaikkaaranaagiya Vaalipan Aasarippuk Koodaaraththai Vittup Piriyaadhirundhaan.

12 mose Karththarai Nokki: Dhevareer Indha Janangalai Azhaiththukkondu Po Endru Sonneer; Aagilum, Ennodekooda Innaarai Anuppuven Enbadhai Enakku Neer Arivikkavillai; Endraalum Unnaip Persolli Azhaiththu Arindhirukkiren Endrum, En Kangalil Unakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhu Endrum, Dhevareer Sonnadhunde.

13 ummudaiya Kangalil Ippozhudhu Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhaanaal Naan Ummai Arivadharkum, Ummudaiya Kangalil Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaippadharkum, Ummudaiya Vazhiyai Enakku Ariviyum; Indha Jaadhi Ummudaiya Janamendru Ninaiththarulum Endraan.
14 adharku Avar: En Samugam Unakku Munbaagach Sellum, Naan Unakku Ilaippaarudhal Tharuven Endraar.
15 appozhudhu Avan Avarai Nokki: Ummudaiya Samugam Ennodekoodach Sellaamarponaal, Engalai Ivvidaththilirundhu Kondupogaadhirum.

16 enakkum Umadhu Janangalukkum Ummudaiya Kangalile Kirubai Kidaiththadhenbadhu Edhinaal Ariyappadum; Neer Engalode Varuvadhinaal Allavaa? Ippadiye Boomiyinmelulla Janangal Ellaarilum, Naanum Ummudaiya Janangalum Viseshiththavargal Endru Vilangum Endraan.
17 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Sonna Indha Vaarththaiyinbadiye Seyven; En Kangalil Unakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhu; Unnaip Persolli Azhaiththu Arindhirukkiren Endraar.
18 appozhudhu Avan: Ummudaiya Magimaiyai Enakkuk Kaanbiththarulum Endraan.

19 adharku Avar: Ennudaiya Dhayaiyai Ellaam Naan Unakku Munbaagak Kadandhupogappanni, Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Unakku Munbaagak Kooruven; Evanmel Kirubaiyaayirukkach Siththamaayiruppeno, Avanmel Kirubaiyaayiruppen; Evanmel Irakkamaayirukkach Siththamaayiruppeno Avanmel Irakkamaayiruppen Endru Solli,
20 nee En Mugaththaik Kaanamaattaai, Oru Manushanum Ennaik Kandu Uyirodirukkak Koodaadhu Endraar.
21 pinnum Karththar: Idho, Ennandaiyil Oru Idam Undu; Nee Ange Kanmalaiyil Nillu.
22 en Magimai Kadandhupogumpodhu, Naan Unnai Andhak Kanmalaiyin Vedippile Vaiththu, Naan Kadandhupogumattum En Karaththinaal Unnai Mooduven.
23 pinbu, En Karaththai Eduppen; Appozhudhu En Pinbakkaththaik Kaanbaai; En Mugamo Kaanappadaadhu Endraar.
